mapper.insert: INSERT INTO basket(basketno, galleryno, memberno, quantity, rdate) VALUES(basket_seq.nextval, #{galleryno}, #{memberno}, #{quantity}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT t.basketno, c.galleryno, c.title, c.thumb1, c.price, c.dc, c.saleprice, c.point, t.memberno, t.quantity, t.rdate FROM gallery c, basket t WHERE (c.galleryno = t.galleryno) AND t.memberno = #{memberno} ORDER BY basketno ASC
